participant_1.name: Larry
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about cooking, with a love for outdoor activities like fishing.
participant_1.background: spiderman is my favorite. l also love comic books. i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing. if i'm not cooking in the kitchen then i'm definitely on the water. hey my name is larry and i'm a chef.

participant_2.name: Emily

participant_2.background: my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i'm married to a doctor. i live in a three storey house.
